name: hurr & the Race against Time
description:
You're a mystical being that sets about restoring the communication towers (that have been disrupted by the presence of agitated creatures) in order to save the life of a little girl, while racing against the clock.

Controls
Arrow buttons for movement
Up arrow or Z buttons for jumping
X button for punching

The assets and engine I've used
I created the player and enemy sprites, and worked on the level design as well as the mechanics for both the main character and the other creatures occupying the communication towers.

This game was made using Construct 2, a visual scripting software similar in vein to Stencyl.

I have used background tiles from OpenGameArt.org, while the sound effects and have been sourced from OpenGameArt.org and SpritersResource.com.

Note:
1) Click on the bottom right corner of the game screen to maximise the view.

2) Press Enter, Space, or click on the Start button to start the game.

Enjoy :)
